goal.ch:
“1.  了解數值天氣預報方法的種類，與利用不同數值方法模擬的特性與限制；
2.  認識複雜數值天氣預報模式的架構與基本設定
3.  簡介數值模式當中不同參數化“

outline.ch:
1. Introduction --- Classification of partial differential equations
2. Finite difference methods
3. Diffusion equations
4. Advection equations
5. Elliptic equations
6. Numerical simulation versus observations
7. Introduce parameteriztion schemes in NWP model and lateral boundary
8. Installation and configuration of WRF model simulation
outline.en:
1. Introduction --- Classification of partial differential equations
2. Finite difference methods
3. Diffusion equations
4. Advection equations
5. Elliptic equations
6. Numerical simulation versus observations
7. Introduce parameteriztion schemes in NWP model and lateral boundary
8. Installation and configuration of WRF model simulation
